article:
The title of 'BTCC champion' is awarded to the driver who scores the most points
overall in a British Touring Car Championship season. From 1992âpresent a
separate championship was awarded to the winning 'independent' (not officially
manufacturer backed) driver, and from 2000-2003 the Production class had its own
championship for the best 'class B' driver.
headings: Lombank Saloon Car Championship Entrants' Trophy winners
